data.actual_result: Quick Switcher doesn't pop up. There is  no response.
data.expected_result: Quick Switcher should pop up, since it works when typing in other text boxes.

data.steps_to_repro: - Click on the search bar on the top right corner of Discord. - Press Ctrl+K.
